page.title: 10THE TOWNHEAD PENRITH
page.content: The Townhead is one long narrow street that leads from the Centre of Penrith to the outlying housing estates on the northern edge of the Town.These are some of the estates Voreda Park, Raislands Croft, Monks Close and Penny Hill Park.Penrith has long had connections with Road Transport and there are a number of Garages serving this Industry.From the youngster's point of view it is very interesting up Macdam Way because we play Hounds & Hares:and you play it like this:you get 5 boys and 5 girls,the girls run away and the boys come after the girls.And when they catch us they tig us three times.Then we chase them and tig them three times.That is what Hounds and Hares is.We have two swings across the road.
